short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to show the LEO translation of selected text on any website by simply rightcklicking it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension adds an entry to the right-click menu of any text on any website. Clicking this new row opens the translation service LEO (http://www.leo.org/) in a new tab and shows the translation of the selected text.
